definition: to abandon oneself to despair/to give up and stop bothering
to abandon/to relinquish/to discard/to throw away

sentences.english: From now on days of A letter is whole excessive drinking, abandonment.
sentences.chinese: 从此阿信整日酗酒，自暴自弃。

sentences.english: That is the syndrome. It is self- defeating and self-sabotaging.
sentences.chinese: 这就是“新一年决策综合症”，是自暴自弃的败笔。

sentences.english: Prisoners are women, it seems as persona non grata, give up on themselves to become.
sentences.chinese: 犯人是名女性，好像因为不受欢迎，而变得自暴自弃。

sentences.english: But the process of surrendering oneself begins with small matters.
sentences.chinese: 但一个人自暴自弃的过程，总是从小的事情开始。

sentences.english: Looking back, I realize it was nothing but self-sabotage.
sentences.chinese: 追忆过去，我意识到那只不过是自暴自弃罢了。

sentences.english: DESPERATE】She became so desperate that we feared for her sanity.
sentences.chinese: 她变得如此自暴自弃，使我们担心她的神智。

sentences.english: Those who abandon themselves will not success.
sentences.chinese: 那些自暴自弃的人无法成功。
如果你没有自暴自弃的话。

definition: to be full of remorse/to repent and redress one's errors
(idiom) to blame the gods and accuse others
to abandon oneself (idiom)/to let oneself go
lit. to smash a cracked pot (idiom); crazy despair in the face of a blemish, defect, error or setback
